Title: Z Day
Writer: Justin Nikles (concept), Rich Van Tine (story & screenplay), Rich Van Tine (story)
Actors: Rich Van Tine, Frank McKenna, Michael Magarino, Ted Martel
Plot: Kyle Jensen is sent to mental facility for killing his mother and step-father, claiming they were becoming zombies and an outbreak is coming. A year later, Kyle discovers the reason for the zombie invasion and the meaning of life itself.
